plot: Work is hard to come by for Jean and his infrequently employed pals Éric and Karim, friends since childhood. At city hall, Jean grabs a chance to swipe a valuable TV camera left unattended....
title: La maîtresse en maillot de bain
plot_es: Work is hard to come by for Jean and his infrequently employed pals Éric and Karim, friends since childhood. At city hall, Jean grabs a chance to swipe a valuable TV camera left unattended....
